# blockedByFilter

**Type Property**

A description of the setting that controls which websites a user can access.

## Declaration

```swift
static let blockedByFilter: SettingMetadata<WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy>
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.ManagedSettings/documentation/ManagedSettings/WebContentSettings/FilterPolicy/none], which indicates that the system doesn’t block any websites.

## Filtering Web Domains

- **blockedByFilter**: The current policy for filtering websites.
- **WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy**: The policies available for filtering web content based on specific web domains.
